stat2.tooltip: Track the total LUCA burned in real time! Each time you book a trip, part of your payment burns LUCA, permanently reducing supply and increasing its value. This helps keep LUCA's economy stable and sustainable.

stat3.tooltip: Users’ savings from booking with LUCA Travel compared to other platforms.
